thread.title: PAS Youth submits memo to US embassy on 'Muslim ban'
thread.title_full: PAS Youth submits memo to US embassy on 'Muslim ban'

title: PAS Youth submits memo to US embassy on 'Muslim ban'
text:
PAS Youth has submitted a memorandum to the United States embassy in Kuala Lumpur, demanding the immediate revocation of the temporary travel ban imposed on seven countries. 
The ban is now often referred to as the “Muslim ban”. 
PAS Youth vice-chief Khairul Nizam Khirudin and other leaders submitted the letter to the embassy's political counselor Tressa Rae Finery.
